actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Spin-Thrash (it can only use this Action while at or below half HP) [Cast, Aura Near | Endure] (3/Day): 9 (2d8), deals half on a pass and heals this Being for the damage roll. Chomp [Melee Attack, Cleave]: 10 (3d6) and Restrained

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Flame Anger: If it takes Fire damage or sees open flame, it goes Berserk (Cd4). Lockjaw: Hinders Checks to end being Restrained by it. Leap: If it uses its Move to Jump, any Being within 5 feet when it lands must pass a [Reflex] Save or take 10 (3d6) and be shoved Prone. The Agnar was originally created by Hankerin Ferinale for Index Card RPG.
